name: Bloodia
detailed_description:
Bloodia is an arcade roguelike where Life, Money and Time are merged.

Your Life is Currency


To boost up your hero, you can buy items at the shop... but using your own life counter. Time also makes your life slowly fade away. Will you trade some of your life to buy powerups ?

This simple gameplay twist makes a complete new way to play traditional dungeon crawlers as you have to adapt at every single level.

Every game session will be completely different and will force you to make choices in front of every chest.

Key Features

  • Pseudo randomly generated dungeons
  • Several worlds with unique rules
  • Weapons and Items to spice up the gameplay
  • Hordes of monsters that will try to stop you
  • Stylised retro pixel art for a unique atmosphere

Play with your friends


The game features two local coop modes, one with Life shared between every player, the other with each player having his own Life counter.

Special rules are added in the multiplayer dungeons, making a completely different experience than the solo run.

Note


The concept of this game was originally developed in 48h from scratch during the Ludum Dare #44 event.
